name: Meat Beaters Adventure
description:
Meat Beaters Adventure is a 2.5D Platforming Adventure game where you the player control a handful of obese farm animals to help them escape from a deadly slaughter house.  Take control of the Cow to smash your way out, the Pig to dash past danger, and the Chicken to fly around certain death. Everywhere you go deadly meat grinders, tricky traps and gruesome evisceration will be waiting for you.

Can you make it out alive?

Fight your way through 5 fully fleshed out levels, each with their own stylistic environments and new challenging hurdles to overcome. Escape each level until you make it all the way out! 

Supports both keyboard and gamepad controls. We recommend that you play with an XboxOne controller. Game controls can be found in game and on the main menu screen.

This is a Student Project created by in our spare time between work and school for our final portfolio show. Check out our other works and professional portfolio sites below.

Co-Created, Directed, Produced by
Jaegon Allison and Josh Farmer Credits: Programming, Particles, Design:
Jaegon Allison 2D and 3D Art/Animation, Textures, Design:

Taylor Lane Music and Sound Design:
Kurt Landre Download for FREEEEEE!!
